vote.title: Authorize (1) the receipt of additional funding under the five-year contract with Health and Human Services Commission (Contract No. HHS000802300001, CFDA No. 10.557) for the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants and Children to (a) revise the budget to allow for acceptance of additional grant funds to increase the FY2021 Administrative allocation by $225,958.00, from $15,514,248.00 to $15,740,206.00; and (b) to redistribute an additional $299,042.00 to the FY21 Administrative allocation for the period October 1, 2020 through September 30, 2021; and (2) execution of the contract and agree to all terms and conditions of any contract amendment or other document required to receive such additional funding, approved as to form by the City Attorney - Not to exceed $225,958.00, from $15,514,248.00 to $15,740,206.00 - Financing:  Health and Human Services Commission Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize (1) the receipt of additional funding under the five-year contract with Health and Human Services Commission (Contract No. HHS000802300001, CFDA No. 10.557) for the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants and Children to (a) revise the budget to allow for acceptance of additional grant funds to increase the FY2021 Administrative allocation by $225,958.00, from $15,514,248.00 to $15,740,206.00; and (b) to redistribute an additional $299,042.00 to the FY21 Administrative allocation for the period October 1, 2020 through September 30, 2021; and (2) execution of the contract and agree to all terms and conditions of any contract amendment or other document required to receive such additional funding, approved as to form by the City Attorney - Not to exceed $225,958.00, from $15,514,248.00 to $15,740,206.00 - Financing:  Health and Human Services Commission Grant Funds
